description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2elre","text":"Western Blot protocol for Pb including all steps from the cell harvest to the final ECL stain. Culture density is an important factor that requires checking prior starting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5p4s9","text":"To concentrate the culture, strain 100 ml of a dense Paramecium culture through a 40 micrometer strainer and split the volume over two 50 ml falcon tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvlbf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7bb75","text":"Centrifuge the strained culture for 10 min at 800xg ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl73i","text":"Remove the supernatant from each falcon tube but leave 1 ml to avoid disturbing the pellet. Transfer the 1 ml into 1.5ml Eppendorf tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3asp4","text":"Centrifuge the sample for 10 min at 800 xg  and remove the supernatant. Leave 50 ul to not disturb the pellet and pool the 2 tubes. You have now concentrated the sample 1:1000 (endvolume: 100 ul) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s0gs","text":"Add 200 ul of pre-warmed 2x SDS buffer (37C) supplemented with Proteinase Inhibitor (Roche; Cat. 4693116001), 2ul RNAseA (Qiagen; Cat. 19101) and 2ul DNAseI (Fisher Scientific; Cat. EN0521) to your concentrated sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25hi4","text":"Incubate the sample at 37C for 30min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4oj0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40oed","text":"Optional: Make dilutions of your sample as needed using pre-warmed 6xSDS loading buffer (37C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3de8l","text":"Optional: Centrifuge at max speed for 5 min and use supernatant to load the gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fhiul","text":"Prepare 1x Running buffer (BioRad; Cat. #1610732)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6shpp","text":"Load the gel using 7ul for the protein ladder and 12 ul of protein extract. Fill empty wells with loading buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ekvgq","text":"Run the gel for 60 min at 100V","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bljke","text":"Prepare 1x Transfer buffer, add 20% methanol (BioRad; Cat.# 1610734) and store at 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86nb4","text":"Soak the transfer membrane (Nitrocellulose Membrane, 0.2um BioRad Cat. #1620112), sponge, filter paper (Mini Trans-Blot Cat. #1703932) and gel in 1x transfer buffer for 15min on the shaker 30rpm at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg4rc","text":"Remove gel from holder and rinse under water. Use spatula to crack open each edge carefully. Optional: Cut a corner to mark the start of your gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lq5p","text":"Assemble the 'transfer-cassette' and try to avoid any bubles. Use the small roller between each step carefully. Sequence: sponge/filter paper/gel/transfer membrane/filter paper/sponge. When closing the cassette try not to put to much pressure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2s10","text":"Put gel electrophoresis chamber into a tray on the magnetic stirrer. Fill the chamber with ice cold transfer buffer and add a spinbar to allow the buffer to move during the transfer. Fill the tray with ice to keep it cold during running and load the cassette into the chamber. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"165qo","text":"Run for 60 min at 100V","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bm6i","text":"Carefully remove the transfer membrane and rinse it in a square petri dish with ultrapure water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2uhe","text":"Incubate the membrane with Pierce Reversible Protein Stain (ThermoScientific, Cat.# 24580) for 4 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cik7t","text":"Remove the stain and rinse the membrane 1x quick with Pierce Destain solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89fql","text":"Remove the Pierce Destain solution and rinse the membrane 2x with ultrapure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"62klg","text":"Incubate the membrane for 5 min in Pierce Destain solution ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc0ch","text":"Remove the Pierce Destain solution and rinse the membrane 4x with ultrapure water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag9l4","text":"Take a picture of the membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2qlkq","text":"Incubate the membrane for 5 min in ultrapure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cp21","text":"Incubate the membrane for 2 min in Pierce Stain Eraser or until membrane is unstained","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ohf9","text":"Remove the Pierce Stain eraser and rinse the membrane 4x with ultrapure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1e5rs","text":"Incubate the membrane for 5 min in ultrapure water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gsdm","text":"Incubate the membrane for 15 min in Denaturation Buffer (pre-warmed at 55C) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tlem","text":"Denaturation buffer (50 mL): 10 mL 10% SDS, 350 uL beta-mercaptoethanol, 6.25 mL 0.5 M Tris HCl, 33 mL H2O (incubate buffer in 55C water bath beforehand). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3g5hu","text":"Incubate the membrane for 1 min in PBS-Tween (1x PBS + 0.1% Tween-20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9r9d","text":"PBS: Sigma Aldrich P4417-50Tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f59oo","text":"Tween-20:Sigma Aldrich P1379-250ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tarf","text":"Incubate in 50 ml EveryBlot Blocking buffer (BioRad, Cat.# 12010020) overnight at 4C on rotor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d9j4","text":"Fill the gel chamber with '1x Running buffer'. Take a pre-made Mini PROTEAN TGX gel (BioRad Cat.# 4561096), rinse it briefly with water and load it into the holder. Carefully remove the comb. Remember to remove the green tape at the bottom. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5k5h","text":"Wash membrane with PBS-Tween (1xPBS + 0.1% Tween-20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1afej","text":"PBS: Sigma Aldrich P4417-50Tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqnsn","text":"Tween-20:Sigma Aldrich P1379-250ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq8s5","text":"Incubate membrane in 5 ml EveryBlot Blocking buffer (BioRad, Cat.# 12010020) with antibody#1  [1:250] for 3 hrs on the rotor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lkgj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eiset","text":"Wash membrane with PBS-Tween (1xPBS + 0.1% Tween-20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jek7","text":"PBS: Sigma Aldrich P4417-50Tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkj2r","text":"Tween-20:Sigma Aldrich P1379-250ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5oj7b","text":"Incubate membrane in 5 ml EveryBlot Blocking buffer (BioRad, Cat.# 12010020) with antibody#2 [1:5000] for 1 hr in the dark on the rotor at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdesj","text":"Wash membrane in 5 ml PBS-Tween (1xPBS + 0.01% Tween-20), shake for 15 min at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aik5c","text":"Wash in 2 ml PBS-Tween (1xPBS + 0.01% Tween-20) and shake for 5 min at room remperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8jesu","text":"Wash in 2 ml PBS and shake for 5 min at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amlct","text":"Prepare Pierce ECL dye mix (2.5 ml of each solution) and stain membrane for 5 min on shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aekg8","text":"Pierce ECL Western (ThermoScientific Cat.#: 32106)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acp9m","text":"Remove the supernatant from each falcon tube and wash the pellet with 5 ml of autoclaved NCL media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88ltc","text":"NCL media: https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.210887411","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":38}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A9D4114674AB11EEB7700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.2108874118"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3n1q2","text":"Centrifuge the washed culture for 10 min at 800xg ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e3bc5","text":"Image membrane","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: WesternBlot Paramecium bursaria (Pb)
